author: Deleted User
content:
Hi everyone,

This is Max (https://github.com/mxinden/), maintainer of (rust-) libp2p, engineer at Protocol Labs, one of the authors of the above discussed _Protocol Select_ (https://github.com/libp2p/specs/pull/349) protocol specification and the _Security-Protocol-in-Multiaddr_ (https://github.com/libp2p/specs/pull/353) proposal.

Great to see the two proposals mentioned here. Both of them are still at an early stage. Given that they are at the core of libp2p, I think it is worth being aware of them already.

Happy to answer any questions, either here or via mail. Also, feel free to send any general libp2p questions my way.

<@!498009160982724610>  mentioned a regular Ethereum 2 call. In case you want to discuss the two proposals there, let me know.
